import pandas as pd import argparse import os from functools import reduce
def format_df(df, sample, ids, unit): cols = ["ensembl_txn", "ensembl_gene", "otthum_gene", "otthum_txn", "hugo_txn", "hugo_gene", "len", "func","empty"] df[cols] = df['target_id'].str.split('|',expand=True) df = df[[ids, unit]] df = df.groupby(ids).sum() df.columns = [sample] df.index.name = "GeneID" return df
fns = [] #for $f in $files: fns.append("${f.name}") #end for
dfs = [] for f in fns: sample = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(f))[0] df = pd.read_csv(f,sep="\t") df = format_df(df,sample, "$ids", "$unit") dfs.append(df)
exp_df = reduce(lambda left,right: pd.merge(left,right, left_index=True, right_index=True, how='outer'), dfs)
#if $matrix: mat = pd.read_csv("$matrix",sep="\t",index_col=0) exp_df = pd.merge(mat, exp_df, left_index=True, right_index=True, how='outer') #end if
exp_df.to_csv("expression_matrix.tsv", sep="\t")
